channel.title: Gauntlet Comics: Coven Prime: Deja Vous Limited Series
channel.description:
Time is out of joint, and its up to the Occult Heroes of *Coven Prime* to step out of the shadows once more to come the aid of New Gauntlet City while navigating the scheming factions of the supernatural world!
This is a 5-part series set in the Gauntlet Comics Coven Prime setting, our homage to the Vertigo occult heroes of the late 90s and early 2000s with a dash of *Blade, Midnight Suns* , and Clive Barker in the mix. Players may pick up playing already-established Coven Prime characters, or create a new PC to become part of the continuity. We'll use Urban Shadows as our base system and tweak it as needed for comic book-style fun.
More information on Coven Prime can be found in the [Gauntlet Comics WIKI](https://gauntletcomics.miraheze.org/wiki/Coven_Prime).
We'll use Safety Tools including Lines & Veils, Script Change, and Open Door to make sure we're all having a scary *good* time. Please note that there will be 4 players in this series, one seat is being held for the person who requested the game.Please note that this event abides by the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
Sessions on Tuesday evenings in September at 8:00 PM Eastern US time. Issue 0, Sept 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MBgCYTtW7YO9SYK_iGv Issue 1, Sept 8: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MBgCmfTDSomos339N3F Issue 2, Sept 15: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MBgCxigvu5_CnejZr8G Issue 3: Sept 22: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MBgD7DGfio_jYL464Pu Issue 4, Sept 29: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MBgDWwyreG2nABbRLF4
